title: Docutech Opens New Scottsdale, Ariz. Office to Support Continued Growth, Expanded Capabilities
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 9:00 AM   DocuTech 
IDAHO FALLS, Idaho -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- In support of the company’s growth initiatives and dedication to providing enhanced services for clients, Docutech Corp., a leading provider of document generation and delivery technology , has opened a new office in Scottsdale, Ariz. The new office will facilitate additional capabilities, enabling Docutech to double its capacity to more effectively serve their growing client base while presenting new career opportunities within the community. 
Overseeing the Scottsdale facility is Scott Klein, who brings more than 20 years of experience in strategic planning and project management. An industry expert, skilled in driving growth, reducing costs and improving performance, Klein previously worked as a warehouse manager at RJ Schinner and served as an operations manager for UPS. 
“Docutech has experienced unwavering growth in recent years, so the decision to open a new office in Scottsdale was a timely effort to successfully and efficiently serve our clients,” said Scott Klein, Regional Fulfillment Manager for Docutech’s Scottsdale, Ariz. and Idaho Falls, Idaho centers. “The new facility is designed to handle more than double our current volume, which will significantly increase our capabilities in producing accurate documents.” 
Docutech’s innovative solutions allow lenders to customize packages to generate documents and reduce operational costs while improving productivity. Using an Internet connection, the software automatically produces and delivers documents. In addition, Docutech supports eSignatures, which enables clients to send and receive signed documents immediately. 
“The new Arizona office will help Docutech take the next step in its growth initiatives and open career opportunities within the region,” said Scott Stucky, chief operating officer of Docutech. “Recruiting top talent ensures that the needs of our clients will be met as Docutech continues to focus on driving results while guaranteeing accuracy.” 
About Docutech 
Founded in 1991, Idaho Falls, Idaho-based Docutech offers a wide-range of solutions to institutions all over the world. From document generation and imaging support, to eDelivery, digital signatures and print fulfillment, Docutech sets the standard in providing market-proven technology and unrivaled customer service to you, your workforce and your clients. For more information visit the company's website at www.docutechcorp.com or follow them on social media at LinkedIn or Twitter @Docutech .
